ships.name: Millenium Falcon
ships.description: Although it looks like a piece of junk its actually an amazing ship. This ship is infamous for making the kessel run in less than 12 parsecs. As well as contributing to the destruction of the galactic empire.

ships.name: Death Star
ships.description: Destroy any annoying planet with ease with this state of the art battle-station. Comes with only one weakness that could see the destruction of the whole station.

ships.name: USS Enterprise
ships.description: Wanting that classic starship feel then look no further than the USS Enterprise, all the speed and armaments you would find on a modern starship but with the added sohpistication the Enterprise offers.
ships.arms: 12 phaser banks, 6 photon torpedo launchers, 1 probe launcher
